avapakāsati：[ava-pa-kāsati＜kassati＜kṛṣ] 捨て去る，投げ捨てる．inf．avapakāsituṃ．
avapakāsati：[ava-pa-kāsati＜kasati＜kṛṣ] 捨て去る，投げ捨てる．inf．avapakāsituṁ

avapakāsati：avapakāsati（kri）
အဝပကာသတိ（ကြိ）
avapakassati-．
အဝပကဿတိ-ကြည့်။

Avapakāsati，[ava + pa + kāsati = kassati，fr．kṛṣ] is a doubtful compd． of kassati，the combd． ava + pa occurring only in this word．In all likelihood it is a distortion of vavakassati （vi + ava + kassati），supplementing the ordinary apakassati．See meaning & further discussion under apakāsati -- Vin．II，204 （apakāsati +; v．l．avapakassati; Bdhgh．in expln． on p．325 has apapakāsati which seems，to imply （a）vavakassati）; A．III，145 sq．（avapakāsituṁ）．（Page 83）

avapakāsati：အဝပကာသတိ （ကြိ）

အဝပကဿတိ-ကြည့်။
